title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 2220/85 of 22 July 1985,
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Recovery of Amounts) (Amendment) Regulations 2022 and come into 
operation on 30 September 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (recovery amounts) (amendment) regulation 2022 come operation 30 september 2022

title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 2220/85 of 22 July 1985,
heading: 2. The European Communities (Recovery of Amounts) Regulations 2003
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Recovery of Amounts) Regulations 2003 

(S.I. No. 463 of 2003) are amended— 

(a) 

by substituting for Regulation 3 (as amended by Regulation 2 of 
the European Communities 
of Amounts) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 13 of 2006)) the 
following— 

(Recovery 

“3. The Minister shall charge interest at a rate of 3 per cent per 
year for the purposes of - 

(a) Article 29 (3) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 
2220/85 of 22 July 1985 as amended by Commission 
Regulation (EC) No. 3403/93 of 10 December 1993; 

(b) Article 28(3) of Commission Implementing Regulation 

(EU) No 282/2012 of 28 March 2012; 

(c) Article 5a(3) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 
3002/92 of 16 October 1992 as inserted by Article 1 of 
Commission Regulation (EC) No 770/96 of 26 April 1996; 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 7th October, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [497] 3 

(d) Article 6(3) of Commission Regulation 

(EC) No 

1130/2009; 

(e) Article 52 (1) of Commission Regulation 800/1999 of 15 

April 1999; 

(f) Article 49(1) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

612/2009 of 7 July 2009; 

(g) Article 49 (3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

2419/2001 of 11 December 2001; 

(h) Article 73(3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

796/2004 of 21 April 2004; 

(i) Article 80(2) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

1122/2009 of 30 November 2009; 

(j) Article 27(2) and 55(2) of Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) No 908/2014 of 6 August 2014, [OJ L 
255, 28.8.2014, p. 59–124; 

(k) Articles 30(2), and 56(2)(c) of Commission Implementing 

Regulation (EU) 2022/128 of 21 December 2021; 

(l) Article 7(2) of Commission Implementing Regulation 

(EU) No 809/2014 of 17 July 2014.” 

and 

(b) 

in Regulation 4 (as amended by Regulation 2 of the European 
(Amendment) 
Communities 
Regulations 2006) by substituting for subparagraphs (a) to (e) 
the following: 

of Amounts) 

(Recovery 

“(a) Article 29(2) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 
2220/85 of 22 July 1985 as amended by Commission 
Regulation (EC) No 3403/93 of 10 December 1993 and 
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1932/1999 of 9 
September 1999; 

(b) Article 28(2) of Commission Implementing Regulation 

(EU) No 282/2012 of 28 March 2012; 

(c) Article 5a(4) of Commission Regulation (EEC) No 
3002/92 of 16 October 1992 as inserted by Article 1 of 
Commission Regulation (EC) No 770/96 of 26 April 1996; 

(d) Article 6(4) of Commission Regulation 

(EC) No 

1130/2009 of 24 November 2009; 

(e) Article 52 (3) of Commission Regulation 800/1999 of 15 

April 1999; 

(f) Article 49(3) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

612/2009 of 7 July 2009; 

(g) Article 49 (8) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

2419/2001 of 11 December 2001; 

 
 4 [497] 

(h) Article 73a(2b) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 
796/2004 of 21 April 2004 as amended by Commission 
Regulation (EC) No 1550/2007 of 20 December 2007 and 
Commission Regulation (EC) No 380/2009 of 8 May 
2009; 

(i) Article 81(4) of Commission Regulation (EC) No 

1122/2009 of 30 November 2009.”

title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 2220/85 of 22 July 1985,
heading: the European Communities (Recovery of Amounts) (Amendment)
text_raw:
3. 

the European Communities (Recovery of Amounts) (Amendment) 

Regulations 2006 (S.I. No. 13 of 2006) are revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 September 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [497] 5
text_norm: 3 european community (recovery amounts) (amendment) regulation 2006 (s.i no 13 2006) revoked given official seal 30 september 2022 charlie mcconalogue minister agriculture food marine 497 5

title: further effect to Commission Regulation (EEC) No. 2220/85 of 22 July 1985,
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Statutory Instrument amends the European Communities (Recovery of 
amounts) Regulations, No. 463 of 2003 and revokes 
the European 
Communities (Recovery of Amounts) (Amendment) Regulations 2006 (S.I. 
No. 13 of 2006). It retains the 3% per annum interest rate (as provided for by 
the European Communities (Recovery of Amounts) (Amendment) Regulations 
2006 (S.I. No. 13 of 2006)) applicable to the recovery of amounts pursuant to 
the EU Commission Regulations specified therein and extends the scope of the 
Regulations to direct payments to farmers under support schemes within the 
framework of the common agricultural policy. 

 
 
 
 
 
 6 [497]
